event.title: CCN-504 Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Bus 0: REQ: H-bit
event.description: Bus 0: REQ: Set H-bit, signaled when this XP sets the H-bit.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Bus 0: REQ: S-bit
event.description: Bus 0: REQ: Set S-bit, signaled when this XP sets the S-bit.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Bus 0: REQ: P-Cnt
event.description: Bus 0: REQ: Set P-Cnt, signaled when this XP sets the P-Cnt. This is not applicable for the SNP VC.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Bus 0: REQ: TknV
event.description: Bus 0: REQ: No TknV, signaled when this XP transmits a valid packet.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Cache Miss
event.description: Counts the total cache misses. This is the first time lookup result, and is high priority.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: L3 SF Cache Access
event.description: Counts the number of cache accesses. This is the first time access, and is high priority.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Cache Fill
event.description: Counts the total allocations in the HN L3 cache, and all cache line allocations to the L3 cache.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: POCQ Retry
event.description: Counts the number of requests that have been retried.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: POCQ Reqs Recvd
event.description: Counts the number of requests received by HN.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: SF Hit
event.description: Counts the number of snoop filter hits.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: SF Evictions
event.description: Counts the number of snoop filter evictions. Cache invalidations are initiated.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Snoops Sent
event.description: Counts the number of snoops sent. Does not differentiate between broadcast or directed snoops.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Snoops Broadcast
event.description: Counts the number of snoop broadcasts sent.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: L3 Eviction
event.description: Counts the number of L3 evictions.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: L3 Fill Invalid Way
event.description: Counts the number of L3 fills to an invalid way.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: MC Retries
event.description: Counts the number of transactions retried by the memory controller.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: MC Reqs
event.description: Counts the number of requests to the memory controller.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: QOS HH Retry
event.description: Counts the number of times a highest-priority QoS class was retried at the HN-F.

event.name: RRT full

event.name: Replayed TXREQ Flits
event.description: Replayed TXREQ Flits.
